text: Scolochilus lautus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Monné and Tavakilian in 1988. It is known from Brazil French Guiana.BioLib.cz - Scolochilus lautus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1988
title: Scolochilus lautus
